channel.title: So I could finally run photoshop again... [img heavy]
channel.description:
Went on a mental photoshopping spree of my facebook friends [img]http://i.imgur.com/vPgQy.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hUXf4.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NO422.jpg[/img] [b]An old classic[/b] (I showed my mum and she was all like "WHAT DON'T POST IT ON THE INTERNET WHAT HAPPENS IF THE POLICE SEE IT")
[img]http://i.imgur.com/prBGn.jpg[/img] My friends decided to get me back...
[img]http://i.imgur.com/25Hdj.png[/img] This is my friend and he has poor eye sight in his right eye...
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JxufY.png[/img] Me
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qvxDO.png[/img] My friend
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jFesl.png[/img] Another friend
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gwjZD.png[/img] and another
[img]http://i.imgur.com/psDzj.jpg[/img] before
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gElA1.png[/img] after
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Uzo8e.png[/img] Me again
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qP3sB.png[/img] This is by far the scariest one I've done
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Qtwye.png[/img] My sister... she wasn't happy
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EtgPQ.png[/img] My old boss, he wasn't happy either
[img]http://i.imgur.com/yBCii.png[/img] aherm...
[img]http://i.imgur.com/xmhmu.png[/img] after showering with male friends he likes to tell children stories
I know some of them are really crappy but I thought I'd share as they made me laugh

@davidude36 wrote:

Went on a mental photoshopping spree of my facebook friends


An old classic (I showed my mum and she was all like “WHAT DON’T POST IT ON THE INTERNET WHAT HAPPENS IF THE POLICE SEE IT”)


My friends decided to get me back…


This is my friend and he has poor eye sight in his right eye…


Me


My friend


Another friend


and another


before

gElA1.png720×480

after

qP3sB.png480×720

This is by far the scariest one I’ve done


My sister… she wasn’t happy


My old boss, he wasn’t happy either


aherm…


after showering with male friends he likes to tell children stories

I know some of them are really crappy but I thought I’d share as they made me laugh
